column4: hi there, i'm trying to install an ubuntu live iso on an usb-stick. should i take the regular iso found at http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/download?
can't find any special live image

i copied the content of the iso to the usb-stick and made it bootable using syslinux -f /dev/sde1, but when booting from it, i get "no operation system found" or something, displayed too short to remember
